column4: Let me ask the question a different way.  I see "http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ precise universe" in sources.list.  I also find on that server an x11 directory: us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ubuntu/pool/universe/x/x11-apps/.  Is that what apt-get is looking for?  Do I need to adjust my sources.list for that location?
if you just install a window manager it should pull in all needed xorg dependecnies
yow is it 'just wanting' to run the memtests?
so your whole grub menu/config got somehow messed up
